snippet.title: How to Survive: Third Person Standalone | Launch Trailer | PC (Steam)
snippet.description:
Since its release in 2013, EKO Software and 505 Games have been evolving and enhancing the How to Survive universe and today they’re releasing a new single player, 3rd-person experience that allows fans to re-play the hit zombie crafting adventure How To Survive from a much more immersive perspective. 

Surviving a horde of natural and unnatural threats whilst crafting your own tools and weapons, fulfilling basic needs of food, water and shelter just got a whole lot more intense.

NOW AVAILABLE ON STEAM:  http://store.steampowered.com/app/360150 

OFFICIAL WEBSEITE: http://howtosurvivethegame.com/
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/HowToSurvive...
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/HowToSurvive1
